org.apache.log4j.bridge

Class ErrorHandlerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.bridge.ErrorHandlerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.logging.log4j.core.ErrorHandler

    public class ErrorHandlerAdapter
extends Object
implements org.apache.logging.log4j.core.ErrorHandler
    Makes a Log4j 1 ErrorHandler usable by a Log4j 2 Appender.
